Description: Fragment of a pottery amphora; rim and neck, reconstructed from three joining fragments; outside covered with cream slip, inside with streaky brown slip. On outside of rim: three dark horizontal stripes, one narrow framed by two broad; neck: three narrow dark stripes, two narrow light brown stripes, two broad dark stripes, one broad brown stripe, one broad dark stripe, two narrow dark stripes. Hard, coarse and porous reddish clay with many white and black inclusions; Munsell 2.5YR 6/6 (light red).
Bibliographic references: Weber 2012 / Untersuchungen zur archaischen griechischen Keramik aus anderen ägyptischen Fundorten (TD 337)
Acquisition notes: Found unregistered in the Department in 2010, in a box with other sherds from Tell Dafana.
